'''Dance of Suigetsu''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Usurahi Butou effect will remain when the player enters a domain, enters a different map layer, enters a different world, removes Ayaka from the party, or restarts the game.
* When this effect is ready, it will be indicated by a glow on Ayaka's right wrist.
